Chaplin

Chaplin is a black and white theme for Jekyll. It was made by Ankit Sultana.

    January 19, 2012 - Using the Web Icons -

    This template uses Typicons web font, provided by Fontello font bundling service. It allows you to quickly add nice icons into your pages by using css tags. To add an icon somewhere in the template simply do: <i class="icon-home"></i> This...
